amendment.description: To provide funds for the operation of the Midway Atoll Airfield by the Federal Aviation Administration pursuant to an operational agreement with the Department of the Interior.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1950 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1950 proposed by Senator Shelby for Senator Stevens. (consideration: CR S13121-13122; text: CR S13121) To provide funds for the operation of the Midway Atoll Airfield by the Federal Aviation Administration pursuant to an operational agreement with the Department of the Interior.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1950 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1950 proposed by Senator Shelby for Senator Stevens.
